mapper.update: UPDATE os_product_image SET product_id = #{product.id}, url = #{url}, sort = #{sort}, status = #{status}, position_id = #{position.id}, position_name = #{position.name}, design_id = #{design.id}, info = #{info}, rotation = #{rotation}, scale = #{scale}, source_url = #{sourceUrl} WHERE id = #{id}
